title: Smart Data Models - DCConverterUnit
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Indivisible operative unit comprising all equipment between the point of common coupling on the AC side and the point of common coupling - DC side, essentially one or more converters, together with one or more converter transformers, converter control equipment, essential protective and switching devices and auxiliaries, if any, used for conversion.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DCConverterUnit
